Hi, I am Paul

About Me

Currently developing my skills as a web developer in order to build functional websites. Also continuing to expand my knowledge of Java and learn more about the Spring Framework in order to develop restful services.

When I am not working on projects, I enjoy playing competitive video games, such as Apex Legends, reading, and chatting/hanging out with my friends.

Feel free to reach out to me if there are any questions!

Projects

Tribute Page

Simple Tribute page created for Dr. Norman Borlaug. Project was for the freeCodeCamp Responsive Web Design course. I recreated to the best of my ability their tribute page.

freeCodeCamp Survey Form

A Survey form created for the freeCodeCamp Responsive Web Design course. I tried to copy their own survey from to the best of my abilities.

Product Landing Page

A mock company website I created for the freeCodeCamp Responsive Web Design course. It is a little Batman theme'd and kind of a joke website. It is not really well designed and could use a quick lookover once again.

Documentation Page

A documentation page created for the freeCodeCamp Responsive Web Design course. It contains information about Java and all information is referenced from the official Oracle's Java Documentation.
